root.name: One Piece: Yume no Lufy Kaizokudan Tanjou
root.description: OverviewOne Piece: Yume no Lufy Kaizokudan Tanjou is a role-playing game developed by Alpha-Unit and published by Bandai for the Game Boy Color platform. One Piece: Yume no Lufy Kaizokudan Tanjou was never released outside of Japan.
